We'll use one of the provided datasets.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)
```

```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

inspec = 
  rest_inspec %>% 
  select(boro, building, critical_flag, cuisine_description, grade, inspection_date) %>% 
  filter(
    !is.na(grade),
    boro == c("BROOKLYN", "QUEENS"),
    cuisine_description == c("Italian", "American", "Chinese")
  ) %>% 
  separate(
    inspection_date,
    c("year", "month", "day"),
    sep = "-"
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    year = as.double(year),
    month = as.double(month),
    day = as.double(day)
  )
```
